hero.title: Smarter Finances, Stronger Business
hero.subtitle: Track expenses, manage revenues, and unlock insights to grow your business ,all in one clean, easy-to-use platform.

features.title: Complete Business Management, All in One Platform
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your business finances, inventory, and operations efficiently

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Complete inventory tracking with stock levels, transfers, categories, and automated reorder alerts

financial.title: Financial Management
financial.description: Track revenues, costs, receivables, and payables with comprehensive financial reporting and analytics

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Generate detailed reports including P&L, cash flow, balance sheet, and custom financial insights

automation.title: Task Management
automation.description: Organize and track tasks with priorities, due dates, assignments, and progress monitoring

wallet.title: Multi-Wallet System
wallet.description: Manage multiple wallets with different currencies, track transactions, and monitor balances in real-time

creative.title: Team Collaboration
creative.description: Invite team members, manage roles and permissions, and collaborate on projects and tasks

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using our platform

slide1.title: Track your business performance
slide1.description: Track your business performance with real-time analytics and insights that help you make data-driven decisions.

slide2.title: Manage your inventory like a pro
slide2.description: Keep track of stock levels, sales trends, and product performance with our intuitive inventory management system.

slide3.title: Smart financial tracking
slide3.description: Monitor revenues, costs, receivables, and payables with automated reports and intelligent cash flow analysis.

slide4.title: Smarter Than Spreadsheets, Cheaper Than Accountants
slide4.description: We are not afraid to say it, this is the future of business management.

tooltips.totalRevenue: Total income from all revenue sources in the selected period
tooltips.totalCosts: Total expenses and costs incurred in the selected period
tooltips.netProfit: Total revenue minus total costs. Positive means profit, negative means loss
tooltips.walletBalance: Current available balance in your wallet for transactions
tooltips.breakEvenPoint: The point where revenue equals costs. Shows if you're profitable or need more revenue
tooltips.profitMargin: Percentage of revenue that becomes profit after covering all costs

insights.revenueGrowthDescription: Your revenue has grown by 15.2% this month compared to last month. This indicates strong business performance and market demand.
insights.costOptimizationDescription: Your operational costs are 8% below industry average. Consider investing in growth initiatives with the saved capital.
insights.cashFlowAlertDescription: You have 3 outstanding receivables totaling EGP 45,000. Follow up on these payments to improve cash flow.
insights.profitabilityDescription: Your gross profit margin is 32%, which is above the industry average of 25%. This indicates strong pricing and cost control.
insights.inventoryHealthDescription: 5 items are below reorder level. Consider restocking to avoid stockouts and maintain customer satisfaction.
insights.growthOpportunityDescription: Your top-performing product category has 40% growth potential. Consider expanding this product line.
